verses.text: \w And|strong="G0080"\w* \w I|strong="G2504"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w could|strong="G1410"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w to|strong="G1410"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* unto \w spiritual|strong="G4152"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* unto carnal. \w As|strong="G5613"\w* unto little ones \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w I|strong="G3568"\w* \w gave|strong="G4222"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w milk|strong="G1051"\w* \w to|strong="G1410"\w* \w drink|strong="G4222"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* meat; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w were|strong="G3756"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w able|strong="G1410"\w* \w as|strong="G1410"\w* \w yet|strong="G3768"\w*. \w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w neither|strong="G3756"\w* \w indeed|strong="G0235"\w* \w are|strong="G4222"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w able|strong="G1410"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G4222"\w* \w yet|strong="G3768"\w* carnal.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w*, \w whereas|strong="G3699"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* envying \w and|strong="G2532"\w* contention, \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w not|strong="G3780"\w* carnal, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*?

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w while|strong="G1510"\w* \w one|strong="G5100"\w* saith, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w indeed|strong="G1063"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w of|strong="G5100"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w of|strong="G5100"\w* Apollo; \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w you|strong="G3752"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*? \w What|strong="G5100"\w* \w then|strong="G1161"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* Apollo, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w what|strong="G5100"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*?

\w The|strong="G3588"\w* ministers \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w him|strong="G1325"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w you|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w every|strong="G1538"\w* \w one|strong="G1538"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* hath \w given|strong="G1325"\w*.

\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G1473"\w* \w planted|strong="G5452"\w*, Apollo \w watered|strong="G4222"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w gave|strong="G4222"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w increase|strong="G0837"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G5620"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3777"\w* \w he|strong="G1510"\w* \w that|strong="G5620"\w* planteth \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* thing, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w he|strong="G1510"\w* \w that|strong="G5620"\w* watereth; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w that|strong="G5620"\w* giveth \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w increase|strong="G0837"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G1161"\w* planteth, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G1161"\w* watereth, ate \w one|strong="G1520"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w every|strong="G2596"\w* \w man|strong="G1538"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* \w his|strong="G2983"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w reward|strong="G3408"\w*, \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w his|strong="G2983"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w* labour.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w we|strong="G1510"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w God’s|strong="G2316"\w* coadjutors: \w you|strong="G1510"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w God’s|strong="G2316"\w* husbandry; \w you|strong="G1510"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w God’s|strong="G2316"\w* \w building|strong="G3619"\w*.

\w According|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w that|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G2316"\w* \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w me|strong="G1325"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w wise|strong="G4680"\w* architect, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G1473"\w* \w laid|strong="G5087"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w foundation|strong="G2310"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w* buildeth thereon. \w But|strong="G1161"\w* let \w every|strong="G2596"\w* \w man|strong="G1538"\w* \w take|strong="G0991"\w* \w heed|strong="G0991"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* \w he|strong="G1161"\w* buildeth thereupon.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w other|strong="G0243"\w* \w foundation|strong="G2310"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w man|strong="G3762"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* \w lay|strong="G5087"\w*, \w but|strong="G3762"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w laid|strong="G5087"\w*; \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* build \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w foundation|strong="G2310"\w*, \w gold|strong="G5553"\w*, \w silver|strong="G0694"\w*, \w precious|strong="G5093"\w* \w stones|strong="G3037"\w*, \w wood|strong="G3586"\w*, \w hay|strong="G5528"\w*, stubble:

\w Every|strong="G1538"\w* \w man’s|strong="G1538"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* manifest; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* Lord \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* declare \w it|strong="G0846"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w revealed|strong="G0601"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* try \w every|strong="G1538"\w* \w man’s|strong="G1538"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w*, \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w what|strong="G3588"\w* sort \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w man’s|strong="G5100"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w* \w abide|strong="G3306"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G3739"\w* hath \w built|strong="G2026"\w* thereupon, \w he|strong="G3739"\w* shall \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* \w a|strong="G2983"\w* \w reward|strong="G3408"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w man’s|strong="G5100"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w* \w burn|strong="G2618"\w*, \w he|strong="G0846"\w* shall \w suffer|strong="G2210"\w* \w loss|strong="G2210"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w* shall \w be|strong="G5100"\w* \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*, \w yet|strong="G1161"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*.

\w Know|strong="G1492"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* dwelleth \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*?

\w But|strong="G1487"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* violate \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, him \w shall|strong="G3778"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w destroy|strong="G5351"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w*.

\w Let|strong="G1096"\w* \w no|strong="G3367"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w deceive|strong="G1818"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*: \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w seem|strong="G1380"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w wise|strong="G4680"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w world|strong="G0165"\w*, \w let|strong="G1096"\w* \w him|strong="G1722"\w* \w become|strong="G1096"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w fool|strong="G3474"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w he|strong="G3778"\w* \w may|strong="G2443"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w wise|strong="G4680"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w foolishness|strong="G3472"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w*: \w I|strong="G3778"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* catch \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w wise|strong="G4680"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w own|strong="G0846"\w* \w craftiness|strong="G3834"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*: \w The|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* knoweth \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w thoughts|strong="G1261"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w wise|strong="G4680"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w vain|strong="G3152"\w*.
\w Let|strong="G1510"\w* \w no|strong="G3367"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w therefore|strong="G5620"\w* \w glory|strong="G2744"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3956"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w are|strong="G3956"\w* \w yours|strong="G4771"\w*, \w whether|strong="G1535"\w* it \w be|strong="G3956"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w or|strong="G1535"\w* Apollo, \w or|strong="G1535"\w* \w Cephas|strong="G2786"\w*, \w or|strong="G1535"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \w or|strong="G1535"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*, \w or|strong="G1535"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, \w or|strong="G1535"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w present|strong="G1764"\w*, \w or|strong="G1535"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w to|strong="G3195"\w* some; \w for|strong="G3956"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w are|strong="G3956"\w* \w yours|strong="G4771"\w*;

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G5547"\w* \w Christ’s|strong="G5547"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w is|strong="G2316"\w* \w God’s|strong="G2316"\w*.
